sources.title: Haphazard | FULL MOVIE | 2020 | Action, Martial Arts
sources.description:
A race to recover a hard drive ensues when a secret US defense satellite containing missile activation codes crashes on a remote island in Thailand.

Selina Lo, Ron Smoorenburg, Vithaya Pansringarm, Damon Whitaker, Dean Alexandrou, Byron Gibson, Craig Ryan, Kelly B. Jones, Damian Mavis, Charlie Ruedpokanon

2020
Directed by Dean Alexandrou

Edited for YouTube ad standards

metadata.Plot: When a secret US defense satellite containing missile activation codes crashes on a remote island off the coast of Thailand, one spy, one rebel, and one criminal race to recover the hard drive.
metadata.Actors: Selina Lo, Damon Whitaker, Ron Smoorenburg
